meanings.definition: Feeling or showing pleasure or contentment.
meanings.sent1: She felt happier after receiving a surprise gift.
meanings.sent2: The children were happier when they played together.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail happily, even happier when given a treat.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in full bloom looked even happier under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons made the party atmosphere even happier.

meanings.definition: More happy or joyful than before.
meanings.sent1: He became happier after achieving his goal.
meanings.sent2: The family was happier after their reunion.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed happier than the dog after getting a new toy.
meanings.sent4: The sky appeared even happier with the rainbow after the rain.
meanings.sent5: The music made the dance even happier with its lively beat.
